casebody.data:
Bruce MILLAR, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
CONSTRUCTION CODE AUTHORITY, Elba Township, and City of Imlay City, Defendants-Appellees. SC: 154437
COA: 326544 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 3, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the motion for review of taxation of costs pursuant to MCR 7.319 and MCR 7.219(E) is considered, and it is DENIED.
